body_html:
another trace:

vmovaps %zmm2,-0xc0(%rdx)
p/x $rdx
$1 = 0x7f7b9400f8a0

0x7f7b9400f8a0 - 0xc0 = 140168740796384, which is aligned to 32 and not 64.
SO far I changed every occurence of EIGEN_MAX_ALIGN_BYTES, but it leaks somewhere else.

	modified:   tensorflow/c/c_api.cc
	modified:   tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc
	modified:   tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.h
	modified:   tensorflow/core/framework/tensor.h
	modified:   tensorflow/core/kernels/ops_util.h
	modified:   tensorflow/python/lib/core/py_func.cc

body:
another trace:
```
vmovaps %zmm2,-0xc0(%rdx)
p/x $rdx
$1 = 0x7f7b9400f8a0
```

0x7f7b9400f8a0 - 0xc0 = 140168740796384, which is aligned to 32 and not 64.
SO far I changed every occurence of EIGEN_MAX_ALIGN_BYTES, but it leaks somewhere else.
```
	modified:   tensorflow/c/c_api.cc
	modified:   tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc
	modified:   tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.h
	modified:   tensorflow/core/framework/tensor.h
	modified:   tensorflow/core/kernels/ops_util.h
	modified:   tensorflow/python/lib/core/py_func.cc
```
